resources.string: EduBright adalah platform pembelajaran interaktif yang membuat belajar jadi mudah dan menyenangkan. Temukan kursus, latihan soal, dan tantangan menarik untuk membantu Anda meraih kesuksesan pendidikan dengan cara yang kreatif dan inovatif.
Are you ready to upgrade your skills?
Are you sure want to logout?
SQL (Structured Query Language) is a powerful and widely-used language for managing and manipulating relational databases. Understanding the fundamentals of SQL is essential.
Learn the fundamentals of database design, including normalization, creating ERDs, and implementing database schemas. Perfect for building efficient and well-structured applications.

Learn how cloud computing revolutionizes IT by enabling on-demand access to computing resources like storage, servers, and applications over the internet. This course covers core concepts such as cloud service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS), deployment types (public, private, hybrid), and key tools used in the industry. Ideal for those looking to build scalable, cost-effective, and flexible IT solutions for modern businesses.

Dive into the world of machine learning. Learn core concepts such as supervised and unsupervised learning, data preprocessing, algorithm selection, and model training. Build a foundation to create intelligent systems, analyze data patterns, and solve complex problems using advanced predictive techniques. This course is perfect for aspiring data scientists and AI enthusiasts.

Master the basics of Kotlin, a modern programming language designed for Android development and beyond. This course covers essential topics such as syntax, variables, control flow, functions, and object-oriented programming. Perfect for beginners aiming to build robust and efficient applications with Kotlin is concise and expressive features.

Explore the principles of creating user-friendly and visually appealing designs. This course covers key aspects of User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) design, including wireframing, prototyping, usability testing, and understanding user behavior. Ideal for those aspiring to craft intuitive and engaging digital products.
